Class Solver

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.model.Solver
public class Solver extends Object
The Solver class is responsible for solving a Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) based on a plan of intersections and sections. It utilizes a strategy pattern for solving the problem and works with a complete graph representation.

  • Constructor Details

    • Solver

      public Solver(Plan plan, List<Integer> vertices, SolvingStrategy solvingStrategy)
      Constructs a Solver with the given plan, vertices, and solving strategy.
      Parameters:
      plan - the Plan object representing intersections and sections
      vertices - the list of vertices to include in the TSP
      solvingStrategy - the strategy used to solve the TSP

  • Method Details

    • init

      public Solver init()
      Initializes the solver by creating a complete graph using the given plan and vertices.
      Returns:
      the Solver object after initialization

    • createCompleteGraph

      Fills the completeMatrix with distances between vertices to create a complete graph representation.

    • pointsToBeServed

      private Map<String,Object> pointsToBeServed()
      Determines how many points can be served and the cost within a given time limit (8 hours).
      Returns:
      a map containing the number of served points and the total cost
